  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • setGame

      public void setGame(Game game, boolean isNewGame)

    • showCharacter

      public void showCharacter()

    • showNickName

      public void showNickName()
      Displays the nickname of the player by setting it on the nickname label.

    • machineTurn

      public void machineTurn()
      Executes the machine's turn in the game. The machine randomly selects a cell on the player's board to attack. If a ship is hit, the machine continues its turn; otherwise, the turn ends. The game state is updated accordingly.

    • showPlayerShips

      public void showPlayerShips(boolean isNewGame)
      Displays the player's ships on the board. Adds graphical representations of ships and previously attacked cells to the player's board.
      Parameters:
      isNewGame - Indicates whether this is a new game, which determines if ships are placed on the game matrix.

    • isGameFinished

      public boolean isGameFinished()
      Checks if the game has been finished by either the player or the machine reaching 20 points.
      Returns:
      true if the game is finished, false otherwise.

    • verifySunkenShips

      public void verifySunkenShips(ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> shipData, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane pane, GameMatrix matrix)
      Verifies and marks ships as sunken if all their cells have been hit. Updates the grid pane to visually represent sunken ships.
      Parameters:
      shipData - List of ship data including positions and dimensions.
      pane - The grid pane where ships are displayed.
      matrix - The game matrix that contains ship and hit information.

    • removeNodeFromGridPane

      public void removeNodeFromGridPane(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane, int column, int row)
      Removes a node from the specified GridPane at a given column and row.
      Parameters:
      gridPane - The GridPane from which the node will be removed.
      column - The column index of the node to remove.
      row - The row index of the node to remove.

    • showMachineMatrix

      public void showMachineMatrix(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Toggles the visibility of the machine's board. If the board is visible, only hits are shown. Otherwise, all ships are displayed.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the user.

    • playSound

      public void playSound(String soundName, float volumeValue)
      Plays a sound file with the specified volume.
      Parameters:
      soundName - The name or path of the sound file to play.
      volumeValue - The volume level for the sound.

    • bSound

      public void bSound()
      Plays the sound for a button click.

    • startSound

      public void startSound()
      Plays the sound for starting the game.

    • finishGame

      public void finishGame()
      Ends the game, checks the winner, and deletes the saved game file if it exists.

    • shootSound

      public void shootSound()
      Plays the sound for shooting a cannon.

    • setEndGameImage

      public void setEndGameImage()
      Sets the end-game image based on the winner (player or machine). Displays a win or lose image with a fade and scale transition.

    • returnImage

      public void returnImage() throws IOException
      Closes the current game stage and opens the welcome stage.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during stage switching.
